name: Subtyrannya
description:
Heyho.

This is the game page for Subtyrannia.

The game is not really existing right now.

But it maybe will.

If I can be bothered to make something.

EDIT:

I attached the first build I threw together today. The only thing you can do is drive around a smol truck in an isometric landscape. I added collision with the walls and a very clunky sound, so that the engine feels better.

The first problem I encountered is the sprite number. Currently there are 4 sprites for the truck. In the end there will be probably 8 needed. If you turn the truck right now, it gets a bit weird with the rotation, as I have to turn the sprite a total of 90°. With 8 sprites, there will be only a 45° turn for every sprite which will make driving much better.
